author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Sorry I'm kinda new to creating packages. The build step is failing because it cannot find a 'Package.toml' file however I have checked other people's approved packages and they do not seem to have the file either. Am I missing something?

This is a bug in automerge that was fixed in this PR: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/RegistryCI.jl/pull/115

That being said, the convention in the Julia community is to start package names with an uppercase letter.

[noblock]
Thanks! I guess I'll change the name and submit a new PR :)
GIven that we have LaTeXStrings.jl, maybe TeXTables would be a good name?

That sounds good! I was also considering XTable since the package aims to implement similar functionality as the 'xtable' R package but I don't know if that would cause problems with the original xtable authors.
I doubt it would cause any problems.

body:
